Overview

This method allows users to retrieve stuff.

Request

Parameter Value

Response

Success: { "response": { "status": "success" } }

Error: { "response": { "status": "error", "description": "error.invalid.sessiontoken", "message": "You cannot be authenticated. You have recently either logged in on a different device, or changed your password. Please login again." } }
